sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

  • Map file updated to contain SIPINT_'LIBTYPE' to fine tune and leverage multiple library types with one map file.
  • Map file updated to contain p1271 8.5.0 b05.8 test cells
  • Map file updated with scan mux cell. This is only used by the clock request module.
  • Asynchronous clock request module flop updated to use a negative edge reset to fix scan issues.
  • VISA structure for the arbiter was inverted to fix bit ordering issues.
  • Lintra waivers added to the source code.

Backend Updates:

  • CDC scripts updated to support different library types.
  • CDC scripts pulled into runCDC from the makefile in the CDC directory.
  • Synthesis script updated to support different library types.
  • Inserted a fix for p1271 8.5.0 flow issues with dft_netlist_checker.tcl
  • Added additional_upf_setup to set voltages in UPF flows.
  • Synthesis scan insertion updated for PGCB DFx override unit.
  • ATPG updated for PGCB DFx override unit for scan on isolation cells.
  • LEC cleaned up, support multiple library types.
  • Modified supported tool variations for sourcing 'setup -x'.
    • The SPT variation is now the default when sourcing the setup file in the tarball scripts directory.
    • When sourcing setup in the assembled network, the same tool variations are available, but thier names have been prefixed with 'rtr_'. To setup the SPT tool variation, do 'source setup -x rtr_spt'
    • Added a DNV tool variation to both tarball and assembled network scripts directories.
  • Moved from Collage 2.1.p8 to Collage 2.1.p9
  • Moved to Collage IOSF::DFX::SCAN interface version 2.2 from 2.1
  • Fixed the Dynamo script so that it returns a non-zero exit status when it errors out.
  • Added consistency checks on port names, port ID's
  • Fixed runVisa scripts in workspace/sideband_network/tools directory
  • The current LEC scripts result in log runs for select configurations. No failures have been found.
  • All backend steps are now run on the Dynamo wrapper.

Validation Updates:

  • Added ACE support for simulations
  • Added support for ACE-based power aware simulation.
  • Resolved most VCS elaboration warnings.

Functional Coverage: 96%

Line Coverage: 97%

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

  • NOTE: that the Sideband Router map file needs to be updated to replace generic library cells.
